english.segment1: I try too hard. Persuasion never wins. So let me start again
english.segment2: And here it is. As plain as day. These words not mine but His. And this is what they say
english.segment3: Chorus: My hands they made you. My breath I gave you. My son he saves you. If you want to, you can wear My name. My love unending. My truth unbending. I want you to wear My name
english.segment4: I'm just like you. Our sin, a cross, His son. As your friends we come
english.segment5: So here we are. Another verse, a different view. God as a Father. Us, His pursuit
english.segment9: One thing's for certain. I want you to wear my name. Wear my name..
